reviews.review: Fajna gra, jeśli ma się prime. Polecam

pretty stupid game. seriously, shots that shouldn't hit, shots that should hit, never ending bugs, game crashing randomly, freezing randomly...... this game has lots of problems but still. i'm addicted.

Fajna gierka nadal grywalna, ale dość graczy nadal na odpale.
Pisze to żeby dostać expa.
Pozdrawiam.
Recommend this game. But be careful, it's very addictive! For only around £12 it's good to get Prime for extras and reduce the risk of cheats!

Игра топ. Хотите почитерить? Тогда это ваш выбор
A great game requires thinking and reflexes.
Лучшие тиммейты. Зашел в игру - узнал свой диагноз совершенно бесплатно и без всяких там обследований. А в больнице бы заплатил за это. Рекомендую.
Bom jogo apesar da grande quantidade de cheaters, especialmente em high level que demoram meses a serem banidos, penso que quando o vac for eficaz este será um jogo muito melhor
Прикольное игра, которая может быть на много больше, но это уже зависит только от вас👌

Как по мне, то лучше аниме смотреть, чем в это играть.
-rep
Classic game. Competetive. Not to much. Not to little. Probably the most entertaining co-op game.
Its been refined since the 90s and keeps getting better. Its probably the best game in its niche.
I do recommend it to other people yes, but it is now literally unplayable if you don't have prime due to all the hackers, but if you have prime its a really fun game.
Rien à rajouter, un bon vieux cs bourré de russe (:
Hodně dobrá hra viď, global soon
